scripts.build-mt-css: npm run build-mt-css-compile && npm run build-mt-css-prefix && npm run build-mt-css-minify
scripts.build-mt-css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/mt.scss mt-static/css/mt.css
scripts.build-mt-css-admin2023: npm run build-mt-css-compile-admin2023 && npm run build-mt-css-prefix-admin2023 && npm run build-mt-css-minify-admin2023
scripts.build-mt-css-compile-admin2023: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/admin2023/mt.scss mt-static/css/admin2023/mt.css
scripts.build-riot: npm run build-riot-listing; npm run build-riot-contenttype
scripts.build-riot-admin2023: npm run build-riot-listing-admin2023; npm run build-riot-contenttype-admin2023
scripts.copy: npm run copy-a-table && npm run copy-bootstrap && npm run copy-bootstrap5 && npm run copy-jquery-ui && npm run copy-jquery-ui-touch-punch && npm run copy-popper && npm run copy-riot && npm run rename-riot-compiler && npm run copy-svg4everybody && npm run copy-mt-chart-api && npm run copy-mt-data-api-sdk && npm run copy-jquery && npm run copy-tinymce5 && npm run copy-tinymce5-language && npm run copy-tinymce6 && npm run copy-tinymce6-language
scripts.copy-a-table: cp -rf node_modules/a-table/build mt-static/a-table.js/ && cp -rf node_modules/a-table/css mt-static/a-table.js/ && cp -rf node_modules/a-table/fonts mt-static/a-table.js
scripts.copy-riot: cd node_modules/riot && cp -f LICENSE.txt riot.js riot.min.js riot+compiler.js riot+compiler.min.js ../../mt-static/riot/
scripts.rename-riot-compiler: cd mt-static/riot && mv riot+compiler.js riot-compiler.js && mv riot+compiler.min.js riot-compiler.min.js
scripts.copy-jquery: npm run copy-jquery-core && npm run copy-jquery-migrate && npm run copy-jquery-validation
scripts.copy-jquery-core: cp -rf node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js mt-static/jquery/ && cp -rf node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.* mt-static/jquery/
scripts.copy-tinymce5: cp -rf node_modules/tinymce5/*.js node_modules/tinymce5/themes node_modules/tinymce5/skins node_modules/tinymce5/plugins node_modules/tinymce5/icons node_modules/tinymce5/license.txt mt-static/plugins/TinyMCE5/tiny_mce/
scripts.copy-tinymce6: cp -rf node_modules/tinymce6/*.js node_modules/tinymce6/themes node_modules/tinymce6/skins node_modules/tinymce6/plugins node_modules/tinymce6/icons node_modules/tinymce6/models node_modules/tinymce6/license.txt mt-static/plugins/TinyMCE6/tiny_mce/
scripts.copy-codemirror: cp -rf node_modules/codemirror/addon node_modules/codemirror/keymap node_modules/codemirror/lib node_modules/codemirror/mode node_modules/codemirror/theme mt-static/codemirror/
scripts.test-riot: docker run --rm -v $PWD:/mt -w /mt node:8 bash -c "npm install -g riot-cli && npm run build-riot && npm run build-ss" && test `git status -s | wc -l` = 0
